pages.text: Now that you have $(l:age4#novasteel)Novasteel Ingots,$() you can create Flerovium in a way that is a little bit easier: With a Corrupting Basin.

The Corrupting Basin can perform all $(d)World Corruption$() recipes the Entropy Reactor can perform. It can also make Corrupted Shards, too, with invalid recipes that don't make anything specific. You just need to fill it with Condensed Void.
